title: Tools for reproducible research workflows in R
text: jeeves builds heavily usethis create research projects. Whereas usethis modular general-purpose, jeeves provides one-line functions complete project setup. running one main jeeves functions, immediately ready start working code rather setting project. default, jeeves sets project : standard project directory structure package skeleton filled DESCRIPTION, NAMESPACE, R/, tests/, LICENSE, README.Rmd, NEWS.md, .Rbuildignore, .gitignore files version control via git GitHub. new repository created GitHub account local project linked package dependencies management via renv installation default development packages pkgdown Quarto website package project. website automatically deployed GitHub pages GitHub action continuous integration via GitHub actions testing deployment skeleton targets pipeline reproducible data analysis Jeeves sets opinionated defaults steps, can customize passing arguments main functions. usethis fantastic package due modularity flexibility. time, like , might find running set 20-30+ usethis, git functions every time start new project. jeeves attempt automate process provide one-stop-shop setting new reproducible project.
